decision_conditions: Condition 3 of 20/00702/FUL is amended to read as follows:No internal alterations shall be carried out until details demonstrating that at least 10% of the new units forming part of this development (a minimum of 1 unit) will be designed to be built to standards for accessible and adaptable dwelling shall have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. This will include details of the location of the accessible and adaptable unit(s) which shall be designed to comply with Building Regulations Part M4(2). If none of the five new units can practically be adapted to the standards for accessible and adaptable dwellings, the provision of the one accessible and adaptable unit shall be identified within the existing studio units to satisfy this condition, in accordance with details to be submitted and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure that an adequate level of accessible units are provided in accordance with Policy D7 of the London Plan (2021), Policy DM13 of the RBK Core Strategy (2012) and the Mayor's Housing SPG (2016).
description: Non-Material Amendment  to Condition 3 of Planning Permission ref: 20/00702/FUL (Alterations and extensions associated with the change of use from student accommodation to provide 63 Co-living residential units, including provision of 5 additional units).
